description: The file that specifies animated textures.
title: Flipbook Texture File

atlas_index.description: The index of the texture array inside the definition of that shortname.
atlas_index.title: Atlas Index

atlas_tile.description: The shortname defined in the terrain_texture JSON file.
atlas_tile.markdownDescription: The shortname defined in the terrain_texture.json file.
atlas_tile.title: Atlas Title

atlas_tile_variant.description: The variant of the block's texture array inside the shortname's block variation.
atlas_tile_variant.title: Atlas Tile Variant

blend_frames.description: Whether or not Minecraft should interpolate between frames.
blend_frames.title: Blend Frames

frames.title: Frames
frames.description: The order in which frame indices to display. Duplicate frames are allowed.

ticks_per_frame.description: The amount of ticks to wait between frames.
ticks_per_frame.title: Ticks Per Frame
